metadata.title: San Antonio Charm, Charms for Bracelets and Necklaces
features: Sterling Silver Handcrafted High Polish Finish
Dimensions: 17.65 MM long x 17.65 MM wide
Unique gift for someone special or a gorgeous piece to complement your own style
description: Experience the quality of Rembrandt Charms. This San Antonio Charm is stamped with the metal quality mark and RQC trademark. All Rembrandt products have a Lifetime guaranteed. Please note the images above are enlarged to show detail. The charm is 17.65 MM long x 17.65 MM wide, it's handcrafted, made to perfectly fit your charm bracelet and will be great add-on to any charm collection.
